description: Akasha (Akasha Martinez), also sometimes called The Living Pharaoh, is a fictional character in the Marvel Universe, a former enemy of Spider-Man who has been associated with Ahmet Abdol. She is currently a potential Initiative recruit courtesy of Tony Stark. Akasha has only appeared in two comic book issues, but she has yet to appear in more.
name: Akasha
powers: can tap into vast cosmic energies granting her much power
